level.heading: SPECIAL EQUIPMENT MOUNTED ON A MOTOR VEHICLE OR TRAILER (ยง 9-703)

level.text: Special equipment mounted on a motor vehicle or trailer and not used primarily for the transportation of persons or property shall be taxed as tangible personal property.

For the valuation of special equipment, the original cost allocated to the registered motor vehicle or trailer shall be excluded from the total original cost of the special equipment and the registered motor vehicle or trailer.

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: Prior to August 5, 1988, the Department of Finance and Revenue published Final Rulemaking notice at 22 DCR 4445, 4448 (February 17, 1976).
